attributes.additional_details:
We are Campaigning against the use of children as soldiers in armed conflict and war. When we did research on the issue, child soldiers, we found out that it is a global issue and more than 50% of people are unaware of it and the government hasn't taken any severe action against it or to stop it.

Please sigh our e-petition and help raise awareness on this issue and take action against it.

The government needs to put sanctions on countries that use children as silders.
